channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- RoboHelp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- RoboHelp

item.title: CVE-2021-21070|2024-09-17T03:59:25.211Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe Robohelp version 2020.0.3 (and earlier) is affected by an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability that could lead to privilege escalation. An attacker with admin permissions to write to the file system could leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges.
